fields.fieldDescription: N/A
User entered description of the branch.
The code describing the local currency (the currency of a local branch).
The code describing the functional currency of the branch's home office.
The code for the parent bank of the branch.
The customer ID associated with this branch.
Indicates whether or not the branch is active.
Indicates whether or not the branch may be deactivated by a user.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
The code for the country of the branch.
Two digits (01-12) representing the month that the fiscal year ends.
The code for the time region of the branch.
The entity code.
"The grace period, defining the number of days after which an interest or principal payment will be considered ""past due"" for the purpose of assessing a ""default penalty spread""."
The code for the funding desk of the branch.
The code for the location of the branch.
The code for the holiday calander of the branch.
Indicator which specifies whether branch is a central branch (or central service unit).
Indicator which specifies whether match funded cost of funds accounting is enabled.
Indicator which determines if cashflow should be netted or not.
Provides a default value for trans that have a borrower net indicator.
The code for the General Ledger of the branch.
